rules_text:
Choose two – 
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
• Atieh’s Command deals damage to any target equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
• You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
• Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control, then discard three cards.
